about_the_game:
The demo version only lets you play one heroine and doesn't have a machine training option.

The singing part is easier than the full version.

content_descriptors.notes:
You can have sex with naked girls in this game.
You can use the mouse wheel to give her ecstasy.

detailed_description:
The demo version only lets you play one heroine and doesn't have a machine training option.

The singing part is easier than the full version.
name: Rhythm of lust Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The demo only lets you play as one heroine, and there are no machine training options.
supported_languages:
English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
